title: Honor Levels
body: On my first day of league, about 6 months ago I got honor 3 that game. Now I get an average of two honors per game but I'm not being shifted into honor 4. What's going wrong?

replies.body:
Reasons.


Main one possibility i can think of is that your actually landing reports, which i believe whether the report is right or wrong, actually harms your honor level.

Otherwise it is to do with Amount of games played more then honor received.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=ctAU1Wjk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-28T02:41:59.288+0000)
>
> Reasons.
> 
> 
> Main one possibility i can think of is that your actually landing reports, which i believe whether the report is right or wrong, actually harms your honor level.
> 
> Otherwise it is to do with Amount of games played more then honor received.

Ah this coiuld be it, maybe I should keep my mouth shut ;p
is it just teammates as in friends honnoring u?

> is it just teammates as in friends honnoring u?

No, I don't duo. I'm always solo.
